prompts.title: Code Review Assistant
prompts.content:
Please review this code for potential issues, bugs, and areas for improvement. Consider: 
- Code quality and best practices
- Performance optimizations
- Security concerns
- Readability and maintainability

prompts.title: Technical Documentation Writer
prompts.content:
Please help me write technical documentation for [project/feature]. Include:
- Overview and purpose
- Installation/setup instructions
- Usage examples
- API reference
- Common troubleshooting steps

prompts.title: Data Analysis Helper
prompts.content:
Analyze this dataset and provide insights on:
- Key trends and patterns
- Statistical significance
- Correlations between variables
- Potential actionable recommendations
- Areas for further investigation

prompts.title: Creative Writing Story Starter
prompts.content:
Help me write a creative story with these elements:
- Genre: [genre]
- Main character: [description]
- Setting: [setting]
- Central conflict: [conflict]
Focus on engaging dialogue and vivid descriptions.

prompts.title: Business Strategy Advisor
prompts.content:
Please analyze this business situation and provide strategic recommendations:
- Market analysis
- Competitive advantages
- Growth opportunities
- Potential risks
- Action plan with timeline

prompts.title: Code Refactoring Guide
prompts.content:
Help me refactor this code to improve:
- Code organization
- Design patterns implementation
- Error handling
- Testing coverage
- Documentation

prompts.title: Content Optimization
prompts.content:
Please help optimize this content for:
- SEO best practices
- Readability and engagement
- Target audience alignment
- Call-to-action effectiveness
- Keywords integration

prompts.title: Problem-Solving Framework
prompts.content:
Guide me through solving this problem using:
- Problem definition
- Root cause analysis
- Solution alternatives
- Decision criteria
- Implementation plan
